deepling guard.behaviour: Deepling guards are fast. They will try to fight in close-combat while shooting spears from a distance. Guards have a somewhat unique retargeting behavior in that they do not move around players in the way to their target, but they do not immediately attack the obstructing player either. In this way, they will stand by the obstructing player and continue to throw spears at their target - and nobody will receive melee damage. The only ways to force a guard to attack you are by the use of [[Challenge]] or by having the target leave the guard's sight.

fire elemental.behaviour: Fire elementals can deal deadly combinations so kill them fast.
fire elemental.name: Fire Elemental

Fire Overlord.behaviour: Behaves similar and looks like a [[Hellfire Fighter]].
Fire Overlord.name: Fire Overlord

flamethrower.behaviour: '''Flamethrowers''' shoot [[Fire Damage|Fire Attacks]] at their targets. They are fixed in position, unable to move.
flamethrower.name: Flamethrower

flamingo.behaviour: They always run when a player is on screen.
flamingo.name: Flamingo

floating savant.behaviour: It fights in close range and rarely retargets.
floating savant.name: Floating Savant

flying book.behaviour: It's much weaker than the other Animated Books and shouldn't be a threat.
flying book.name: Flying Book

football.behaviour: Constantly rolling around, does no damage.
football.name: Football (Creature)

Foreman Kneebiter.behaviour: Foreman Kneebiter chases the opponent until death.
Foreman Kneebiter.name: Foreman Kneebiter

Foreshock.behaviour: After taking some damage he will transform into [[Aftershock]] and vice versa.
Foreshock.name: Foreshock

forest fury.behaviour: They keep a distance from their targets.
forest fury.name: Forest Fury

fox.behaviour: They fight in close combat until death.
fox.name: Fox

frazzlemaw.behaviour: Chases its target and fights in close combat. A Frazzlemaw will walk over all fields to reach its target.
frazzlemaw.name: Frazzlemaw

frost dragon hatchling.behaviour: They are slow and attack with waves.
frost dragon hatchling.name: Frost Dragon Hatchling

frost flower asura.behaviour: The Frost Flower Asuri fight from distance.
frost flower asura.name: Frost Flower Asura

frost giant.behaviour: Frost Giants fight to the death, they can push objects and can't be pushed.
frost giant.name: Frost Giant

frost giantess.behaviour: She likes to keep distance between her and the target, while throwing boulders.
frost giantess.name: Frost Giantess

frost servant.behaviour: Frost Servants chase their opponent and try to obstruct them from defeating their master, [[Zushuka]].
frost servant.name: Frost Servant

frost spider.behaviour: Frost Spiders chase their opponent and try to obstruct them from defeating their master, [[Zushuka]].
frost spider.name: Frost Spider

Frostfur.behaviour: Fights until death in close combat.
Frostfur.name: Frostfur

frozen man.behaviour: He doesn't move from his place.
frozen man.name: Frozen Man

Fugue.name: Fugue
Fugue.primarytype: Members of the Order of the Lion

furious scorpion.behaviour: It fights in close combat but also throws arrows from distance.
furious scorpion.name: Furious Scorpion

furious troll.behaviour: Fights to the death in close combat, often summoning [[Mechanical Fighter]]s.
furious troll.name: Furious Troll

fury.behaviour: Its most distinctive behavior is its high speed which helps it reach its target very quickly.
fury.name: Fury

Gaffir.name: Gaffir
Gaffir.primarytype: Members of the Order of the Cobra

gamemaster.behaviour: Kills everyone in its path. It's not a description, but a fact.
gamemaster.name: Gamemaster (Creature)

gargoyle.behaviour: They seem to [[retarget]] on the player with the highest level around.
gargoyle.name: Gargoyle

Gaz haragoth.name: Gaz'haragoth

gazer spectre.behaviour: Fights in close combat. Reflects [[Fire Damage]]. Does not change target unless [[Challenge|challenged]] or its way is blocked.
gazer spectre.name: Gazer Spectre

ghastly dragon.behaviour: These creatures run at low health, and a very good thing about them is that they don't change attack often.
ghastly dragon.name: Ghastly Dragon

Ghastly Pet of Chayenne.behaviour: Likely the same as a [[Ghastly Dragon]]
Ghastly Pet of Chayenne.name: Ghastly Pet of Chayenne

Ghazbaran.behaviour: Ghazbaran runs away in low [[Hit Points|health]]. He also casts a defense spell on himself which will temporarily reduce every attacker's skill (depending on what he hits with) to 0. He will only remain in the realm for 4 hours.
Ghazbaran.name: Ghazbaran

ghost of a planegazer.behaviour: Stays at a distance shooting its magic.
ghost of a planegazer.name: Ghost of a Planegazer

ghost rat.behaviour: They run very fast and make holes in lowest floor of the Spectral Ship.
ghost rat.name: Ghost Rat

ghostly apparition.behaviour: Ghostly Apparitions keep distance from their targets.
ghostly apparition.name: Ghostly Apparition

ghoul.behaviour: Ghouls don't run in low health, can't be pushed and they move objects.
ghoul.name: Ghoul

ghoulish hyaena.behaviour: Runs away in low health (about 30 or less). May sprint really fast for a short time.
ghoulish hyaena.name: Ghoulish Hyaena

Ghulosh.behaviour: It will become [[Ghulosh' Deathgaze]] after being hit for a while.
Ghulosh.name: Ghulosh

Ghulosh Deathgaze.behaviour: It attacks from distance and moves very slowly.
Ghulosh Deathgaze.name: Ghulosh' Deathgaze

giant beaver.behaviour: The Giant Beaver ignore players and wanders around.
giant beaver.name: Giant Beaver

gladiator.behaviour: Runs at very low health, can't move items and can be pushed.
gladiator.name: Gladiator

glooth bandit.behaviour: The Glooth Bandit will chase down its foes, firing arrows if they try to escape.
glooth bandit.name: Glooth Bandit

glooth bomb.behaviour: It will attack someone that is in its melee range.
glooth bomb.name: Glooth Bomb

glooth brigand.behaviour: The glooth brigand will chase down its foes, firing arrows if they try to escape.
glooth brigand.name: Glooth Brigand

Glooth Fairy.behaviour: Fights in close range. Often stops chasing and walks aimlessly for 2-3 seconds before retargetting(passing through fire walls to hit the player).
Glooth Fairy.name: Glooth Fairy

glooth golem.behaviour: Fights until death. In spite of the experience received from this creature, its fighting capabilities can easily match a [[War Golem]]'s or [[Behemoth]]'s.
glooth golem.name: Glooth Golem

glooth powered minotaur.behaviour: It fights in close combat like a stronger [[Moohtant]].
glooth powered minotaur.name: Glooth Powered Minotaur

gnarlhound.behaviour: They usually haste towards you upon first sight, but are not that powerful. They run away in red hp.
gnarlhound.name: Gnarlhound

gnome pack crawler.behaviour: It will run away from you, but it doesn't attack.
gnome pack crawler.name: Gnome Pack Crawler

Gnomevil.behaviour: Gnomevil attacks the player dealing the most damage.
Gnomevil.name: Gnomevil

Gnorre Chyllson.behaviour: Fight to death in close combat.
Gnorre Chyllson.name: Gnorre Chyllson

goblin.behaviour: Goblins can be pushed and don't move objects.
goblin.name: Goblin

goblin assassin.behaviour: '''Goblin Assassins''' retreat in [[Health|red health]]. They can be pushed and don't move objects.
goblin assassin.name: Goblin Assassin

goblin leader.behaviour: '''Goblin Leaders''' retreat in [[Health|low health]]. They can't move objects but can be pushed.
goblin leader.name: Goblin Leader

goblin scavenger.behaviour: Runs in red [[health]], but will return if they heal themselves to yellow health. They can be [[push]]ed and don't move objects that are in their way.
goblin scavenger.name: Goblin Scavenger

golden servant.behaviour: Runs in low health. They will respawn even if you are in the dungeon (all around you), so be careful if you walk in the big rooms.
golden servant.name: Golden Servant

gozzler.behaviour: '''Gozzlers''' are hungry imps with two mouths. They fight to the death.
gozzler.name: Gozzler

Grand Canon Dominus.name: Grand Canon Dominus
Grand Canon Dominus.primarytype: Members of the Order of the Falcon

Grand Chaplain Gaunder.name: Grand Chaplain Gaunder
Grand Chaplain Gaunder.primarytype: Members of the Order of the Falcon

Grand Commander Soeren.name: Grand Commander Soeren
Grand Commander Soeren.primarytype: Members of the Order of the Falcon

Grand Master Oberon.behaviour: This boss will heal completely and a [[Falcon Knight]] or a [[Falcon Paladin]] will spawn when it reaches ~3000 hp left and will keep healing every single hit it takes until the player replies to his [[The Grand Master of Verbal Debate|debate]] argument.
Grand Master Oberon.name: Grand Master Oberon
Grand Master Oberon.primarytype: Members of the Order of the Falcon

Grand Mother Foulscale.behaviour: She will run away with red hp.
Grand Mother Foulscale.name: Grand Mother Foulscale

gravedigger.behaviour: They fight in close range and run on deep red health.
gravedigger.name: Gravedigger

Gravelord Oshuran.behaviour: He behaves almost like a regular [[Lich]], paralyzing you very intensely.
Gravelord Oshuran.name: Gravelord Oshuran

greater fire elemental.behaviour: Follows target, fights until the death.
greater fire elemental.name: Greater Fire Elemental

greater splinter of madness.behaviour: After some seconds 15~ it will turn into a [[Mighty Splinter of Madness]].
greater splinter of madness.name: Greater Splinter of Madness

green djinn.behaviour: Green Djinns use strong melee when close to their opponents, and [[Energy|Energy Attacks]] when the opponent is at a [[distance]].
green djinn.name: Green Djinn

grim reaper.behaviour: Chases their target to melee range and retargets frequently.
grim reaper.name: Grim Reaper

grimeleech.behaviour: They retarget sometimes, so using a [[Dwarven Ring]] is advisable for shooters or in case of running them.
grimeleech.name: Grimeleech

grynch clan goblin.behaviour: They don't attack even if cornered.
grynch clan goblin.name: Grynch Clan Goblin

Guard Captain Quaid.behaviour: Quaid stays at a ranged distance, On occasion he will spawn with an [[Ugly Monster]], which can drop [[food]] or a [[Giant Ruby]]
Guard Captain Quaid.name: Guard Captain Quaid
Guard Captain Quaid.primarytype: Members of the Order of the Cobra

hand of cursed fate.behaviour: A cowardly creature that retreats early upon being damaged and often goes invisible.
hand of cursed fate.name: Hand of Cursed Fate

hardened usurper archer.name: Hardened Usurper Archer
hardened usurper archer.primarytype: Members of the Order of the Lion

hardened usurper knight.name: Hardened Usurper Knight
hardened usurper knight.primarytype: Members of the Order of the Lion

hardened usurper warlock.name: Hardened Usurper Warlock
hardened usurper warlock.primarytype: Members of the Order of the Lion

haunted treeling.behaviour: It tries to engage in close combat, and fights to the death. It is very aggressive, uses its magical abilities often. It can shoot at its target even when it is off sight.
haunted treeling.name: Haunted Treeling

hellfire fighter.behaviour: This monster will spam fire spells. Not too dangerous if you avoid the beam.
hellfire fighter.name: Hellfire Fighter

Hellgorak.behaviour: Fights to the death, retargets rapidly.
Hellgorak.name: Hellgorak

hellhound.behaviour: '''Hellhounds''' stand and fight to the death.
hellhound.name: Hellhound

hellspawn.behaviour: '''Hellspawns''' are fast. They are usually found in groups with other hellspawns, and maybe some other creatures like [[Plaguesmith]]s or [[Gozzler]]s.
hellspawn.name: Hellspawn

herald of gloom.behaviour: Shoots at player while maintaining distance.
herald of gloom.name: Herald of Gloom

hero.behaviour: Heroes attack the enemy with deadly hits and shoot them with [[arrow]]s when they try to escape.
hero.name: Hero

hibernal moth.behaviour: The Hibernal Moth will follow and target other wild creatures, but will not be attacked by them. It's very weak and not a real threat.
hibernal moth.name: Hibernal Moth

hideous fungus.behaviour: Hideous fungi will position themselves at a distance. All of their attacks are distance-based. They will retarget to the player to damage them first.
hideous fungus.name: Hideous Fungus

High Templar Cobrass.behaviour: It attacks using melee. It is a stronger version of a [[Lizard Templar]]. High Templar Cobrass fights until death.
High Templar Cobrass.name: High Templar Cobrass

hive overseer.behaviour: Stays away from target while letting the summoned [[Spidris Elite]] do most of the job. They can [[retarget]].
hive overseer.name: Hive Overseer

Hive Pore.behaviour: Remains static in position, much like [[Traps]].
Hive Pore.name: Hive Pore

holy bog frog.behaviour: Holy Bog Frogs always run away.
holy bog frog.name: Holy Bog Frog

humongous fungus.behaviour: Humongous fungi will fight at close combat.
humongous fungus.name: Humongous Fungus

humorless fungus.behaviour: Humorless fungi are summons of [[Hideous Fungus|hideous fungi]]. Just as their leader, they will stand and shoot at their opponents from a distance.
humorless fungus.name: Humorless Fungus

hunter.behaviour: Hunters run when in low health. They can't be pushed and move objects.
hunter.name: Hunter

husky.behaviour: Similar to [[dog]]s, huskies are not aggressive; they are fast and will follow you as if you were a piece of meat.
husky.name: Husky

ice golem.behaviour: They move slowly and are easy to outrun, but will deal a lot of damage if they catch you.
ice golem.name: Ice Golem

Ice Overlord.behaviour: '''Ice Overlord''' attacks the enemy in close combat.
Ice Overlord.name: Ice Overlord

Ice Witch.behaviour: She'll try to keep her distance, paralyze and spam you with attacks.
Ice Witch.name: Ice Witch

icicle.behaviour: They can't move from their place.
icicle.name: Icicle (Creature)

incredibly old witch.behaviour: Like a common [[Witch]], she keeps a distance from you but doesn't run away completely. Also she switch target often.
incredibly old witch.name: Incredibly Old Witch

infernal demon.behaviour: It retargets very frequently and usually on the character with the lowest heal its view, in most cases, a [[Sorcerer]] or a [[Druid]].
infernal demon.name: Infernal Demon

instable fire.behaviour: Runs away from players very fast.
instable fire.name: Instable Fire

Irahsae.behaviour: Fights at close combat, runs away at very low hp. Does not retarget from the blocker, even when taking massive damage from the shooters.
Irahsae.name: Irahsae

iron servant.behaviour: Unlike its stronger counterparts Iron Servants do NOT run in low health. They will even respawn if you are in the dungeon (just next to you), so be careful while walking in the big rooms.
iron servant.name: Iron Servant

ironblight.behaviour: Ironblights will fight their opponents in close combat. Ironblights retarget very frequently.
ironblight.name: Ironblight

Izcandar Champion of Summer.behaviour: Izcandar retargets very often and the blocker should use [[Challenge]] frequently.
Izcandar Champion of Summer.name: Izcandar Champion of Summer

Izcandar Champion of Winter.behaviour: Izcandar retargets very often and the blocker should use [[Challenge]] frequently.
Izcandar Champion of Winter.name: Izcandar Champion of Winter

Izcandar the Banished.behaviour: Izcandar retargets very often and the blocker should use [[Challenge]] frequently.
Izcandar the Banished.name: Izcandar the Banished

jagged earth elemental.behaviour: Jagged Earth Elementals approach the player in close combat and do not run in low health.
jagged earth elemental.name: Jagged Earth Elemental

Jaul.behaviour: He combos a lot, walks pretty fast and retargets a lot.
Jaul.name: Jaul

juggernaut.behaviour: It only wishes death to intruders of it's domain, so it will charge on you with all haste.
juggernaut.name: Juggernaut

juvenile cyclops.behaviour: They will not [[Retargeting|retarget]] to other players unless the player hides behind of across another player. They kill or move creatures and items that are in their way, therefore items are not effective in blocking their path.
juvenile cyclops.name: Juvenile Cyclops

Kesar.behaviour: Kesar can be a nice blocker when you are facing a mutual enemy.
Kesar.name: Kesar
Kesar.primarytype: Members of the Order of the Lion

killer caiman.behaviour: These creatures fight in close combat using [[melee]] and are frequently using [[haste]].
killer caiman.name: Killer Caiman

Kitty.behaviour: It attacks you with its claws.
Kitty.name: Kitty

knight familiar.behaviour: Stands shooting at a distance of 4 sqm from the player target. Every turn he will shoot only one of its abilities.
knight familiar.name: Knight Familiar

knight s apparition.behaviour: This creature fights in close range.
knight s apparition.name: Knight's Apparition

kongra.behaviour: Kongras will run away from attackers at 10 hp. They can move items that are in their way.
kongra.name: Kongra

Koshei the Deathless.behaviour: Will try to kill you while summoning a [[Bonebeast]].
Koshei the Deathless.name: Koshei the Deathless

Kraknaknork s Demon.behaviour: It's the first creature that kills you. It wasn't created to die, but just to kill players and show that the death is part of the game.
Kraknaknork s Demon.name: Kraknaknork's Demon

Kreebosh the Exile.behaviour: He is more vicious than a regular [[Efreet]], fights in close combat.
Kreebosh the Exile.name: Kreebosh the Exile

lacewing moth.behaviour: The Lacewing Moth will follow and target other wild creatures, but will not be attacked by them. It's very weak and not a real threat.
lacewing moth.name: Lacewing Moth

Lady Tenebris.behaviour: Fights in close combat. Every couple minutes she will teleport players into the middle of the room and after a few seconds she will cast an ultimate explosion around her (7sqm radius) that deals up to 2500 [[Death Damage]].
Lady Tenebris.name: Lady Tenebris

ladybug.behaviour: It's very slow, tries to get close to you while attacking with poison.
ladybug.name: Ladybug

Latrivan.behaviour: Walls of the room is lines with [[shredderthrower]]s. Also [[Golgordan]], his brother, is in the same room.
Latrivan.name: Latrivan

lava golem.behaviour: Lava golems will fight in close combat.
lava golem.name: Lava Golem

lavahole.behaviour: '''Lavaholes''' shoot [[Fire Damage|Fire Attacks]] at their targets. They are unable to move and be moved.
lavahole.name: Lavahole

leaf golem.behaviour: They fight in close range, and push weaker creatures.
leaf golem.name: Leaf Golem

Lersatio.behaviour: He fights till death. Uses [[Invisibility]] very often.
Lersatio.name: Lersatio

lesser splinter of madness.behaviour: After some seconds 15~ it will turn into a [[Greater Splinter of Madness]].
lesser splinter of madness.name: Lesser Splinter of Madness

Leviathan.behaviour: Heals as quickly as a [[Hydra]] and stronger, also runs away in deep red health.
Leviathan.name: Leviathan

librarian.behaviour: A Librarian will stay away from its target while continuously healing its allies.
librarian.name: Librarian

lich.behaviour: The Lich will chase the enemy while [[summon]]ing [[Bonebeast]]s and casting various draining spells.
lich.name: Lich

lion archer.name: Lion Archer
lion archer.primarytype: Members of the Order of the Lion

lion commander.behaviour: Lion Commanders help you when facing mutual enemies.
lion commander.name: Lion Commander
lion commander.primarytype: Members of the Order of the Lion

lion knight.name: Lion Knight
lion knight.primarytype: Members of the Order of the Lion

lion warlock.name: Lion Warlock
lion warlock.primarytype: Members of the Order of the Lion

lizard dragon priest.behaviour: Keeps its distance while shooting fire missiles. Runs in low [[health]].
lizard dragon priest.name: Lizard Dragon Priest

lizard high guard.behaviour: Faster than weaker lizards. Often appears with [[Lizard Dragon Priest|dragon priests]] and [[Lizard Legionnaire|legionnaires]]. These creatures can be skinned with an [[Obsidian Knife]]. See also: [[Lizard Leather/Skinning]].
lizard high guard.name: Lizard High Guard

lizard legionnaire.behaviour: They like to stay at a distance and use their [[Spear]]s to attack. They run at 10 health or less.
lizard legionnaire.name: Lizard Legionnaire

lizard magistratus.behaviour: '''Lizard Magistratus''' fight until death and [[Self Healing|heal]] themselves very often.
lizard magistratus.name: Lizard Magistratus

lizard sentinel.behaviour: They run at [[Health|dark red health]]. They like to keep a distance from their targets, while shooting [[spear]]s.
lizard sentinel.name: Lizard Sentinel

lizard snakecharmer.behaviour: '''Lizard Snakecharmers''' fight until death, [[Self Healing|heal]] themselves and [[summon]] lots of [[Cobra]]s. The [[Cobra]]s don't hit you with [[Physical Damage]] but [[Poisoned|poisons]] you. They keep blocking your way and you sometimes can't retreat.
lizard snakecharmer.name: Lizard Snakecharmer

lonely Deer.behaviour: Unlike a regular [[Deer]], a lonerly deer follows its target.
lonely Deer.name: Lonely Deer

Lord of the Elements.behaviour: This creature retargets all the time and can easily kill the mages. Also, it's very fast.
Lord of the Elements.name: Lord of the Elements

lost berserker.behaviour: Lost berserkers will fight in close combat.
lost berserker.name: Lost Berserker

lost ghost of a planegazer.behaviour: Stands at a distance of 4 tiles and attacks.
lost ghost of a planegazer.name: Lost Ghost of a Planegazer

lost gnome.behaviour: It will follow you around without attacking you.
lost gnome.name: Lost Gnome

lucky dragon.behaviour: Walks around looking for a lucky spot.
lucky dragon.name: Lucky Dragon

mad mage.behaviour: His attacks are a bit similar to a [[Fire Elemental]]'s and [[Thornfire Wolf]]'s, but a bit stronger.
mad mage.name: Mad Mage

mad scientist.behaviour: It's similar to [[Dark Apprentice]]s and [[Dark Magician]]s, however Mad Scientists fights in close combat, while the others keep their distance; and it has stronger magic damage than the others.
mad scientist.name: Mad Scientist

mad technomancer.behaviour: Like a dwarf geomancer, keeps distance, but unlike geomancers they run in red hp. Beware of his speed, he runs fast when fleeing.
mad technomancer.name: Mad Technomancer

magic pillar.behaviour: '''Magic Pillars''' are unable to move. They don't harm you, but their [[summon]]s do.
magic pillar.name: Magic Pillar

magicthrower.behaviour: '''Magicthrowers''' shoot [[Earth Damage|Earth-based attacks]] at their targets. They are unable to move.
magicthrower.name: Magicthrower

magma crawler.behaviour: This kind of creature keep distance from his target,if target reach him very close he use melee and fire berserk. His great death beam is really dangerous, making damage every turn ~1200 hit points
magma crawler.name: Magma Crawler

Mahrdis.behaviour: Malicious, will make all efforts to destroy intruders.
Mahrdis.name: Mahrdis

makeshift home.behaviour: It's immobile but will attack you from distance.
makeshift home.name: Makeshift Home

Mamma Longlegs.behaviour: Similar to a [[Hydra]] but with weaker healing.
Mamma Longlegs.name: Mamma Longlegs

mammoth.behaviour: It will push or kill weaker creatures in its path to reach you.
mammoth.name: Mammoth

many faces.behaviour: This creature is able to destroy player-made [[Magic Wall (Object)|Magic Walls]] and [[Wild Growth (Object)|Wild Growth]].
many faces.name: Many Faces

marid.behaviour: Marid seems to be a Higher Ranked [[Blue Djinn]].
marid.name: Marid

Marziel.behaviour: Goes invisible often, sometimes turns into a bat and fights until death.
Marziel.name: Marziel

massive fire elemental.behaviour: Follows target, fights until the death.
massive fire elemental.name: Massive Fire Elemental

massive water elemental.behaviour: Massive Water Elementals are as fast as a [[Level]] 100 character.
massive water elemental.name: Massive Water Elemental

Maw.behaviour: Keeps distance while shooting low amounts of damage and healing himself.
Maw.name: Maw

Maxxenius.behaviour: It does not retarget very often, but will frequently transform its target on an [[Energy Elemental]]. It uses its Energy Beam and Wave very often, frequently on the same turn, which may result in a high combo.
Maxxenius.name: Maxxenius

Mazoran.behaviour: It fights in close range and does not retarget often.
Mazoran.name: Mazoran

mean termite.behaviour: They will run away from you.
mean termite.name: Mean Termite

mechanical fighter.behaviour: Follows the victim without mercy but still runs in low health.
mechanical fighter.name: Mechanical Fighter

medusa.behaviour: They chase you to hit you in melee range. Retargets very often. Runs away at low health (around 600).  They sometimes deal deadly combos almost as dangerous as a demon. They have the ability to kill a level 80 knight with one strong combo. Soloing below 150 is possible but not recommended as they usually appear with many other '''Medusae''', [[Hydra]]s and [[Serpent Spawn]]s.
medusa.name: Medusa

Mephiles.behaviour: He will attack at a certain distance. Therefore, if you approach him, he will run away.
Mephiles.name: Mephiles

mercury blob.behaviour: Like a [[Slime]], will advance towards its prey in attempt to overwhelm it by [[summon]]ing more Mercury Blobs.
mercury blob.name: Mercury Blob

merlkin.behaviour: Merlkin can be very tricky because they can spam you with attacks and walk away. They will try to keep a short distance from you, but they are easy to catch since they do not run very fast. They can move items that are in their way and [[Retarget]]. They have the ability to bring down even a high level player.
merlkin.name: Merlkin

metal gargoyle.behaviour: Metal gargoyles can retarget. This may causes shooters in a team hunt to be cursed or killed.
metal gargoyle.name: Metal Gargoyle

midnight panther.behaviour: It will hit you with [[melee]] and if you try to tame it, it may dissapear (run away). They will kill weaker creatures to reach you. The panther is a quick creature.
midnight panther.name: Midnight Panther

Mindmasher.behaviour: Summons copies of himself to attack with. Both him and his summons can go invisible. Its summons are extremely weak to physical damage.
Mindmasher.name: Mindmasher

Minishabaal.behaviour: Can spam his attacks very fast.
Minishabaal.name: Minishabaal

minotaur amazon.behaviour: It fights from a distance throwing spears at its target.
minotaur amazon.name: Minotaur Amazon

minotaur cult follower.behaviour: It looks like a regular [[Minotaur]] but it's much stronger. You can skin its corpse using an [[Obsidian Knife]] to get a [[Minotaur Leather]].
minotaur cult follower.name: Minotaur Cult Follower

minotaur cult prophet.behaviour: Unlike [[Minotaur Mage]]s, they fight in close combat. They can heal themselves as well as their allies.
minotaur cult prophet.name: Minotaur Cult Prophet

minotaur guard.behaviour: '''Minotaur Guards''' will kill weaker [[creatures]] to reach a player. They can also [[retarget]].
minotaur guard.name: Minotaur Guard

minotaur idol.behaviour: They fight in close combat until death.
minotaur idol.name: Minotaur Idol

minotaur invader.behaviour: Fights in close combat similar to an [[Execowtioner]].
minotaur invader.name: Minotaur Invader

minotaur totem.behaviour: They do not move and stand still casting its mass healing spell constantly.
minotaur totem.name: Minotaur Totem

mirror image.behaviour: Attacks from distance ranged until it transforms into an apparition.
mirror image.name: Mirror Image

misguided bully.behaviour: Fights in close combat until death.
misguided bully.name: Misguided Bully

misguided shadow.behaviour: Fights in close combat until death.
misguided shadow.name: Misguided Shadow

misguided thief.behaviour: Fights in close combat until death.
misguided thief.name: Misguided Thief

monk.behaviour: Monks chase the enemy until death.
monk.name: Monk

Mooh Tah master.behaviour: Cannot be killed. Attacks until you leave or die.
Mooh Tah master.name: Mooh'Tah Master

Morguthis.behaviour: Malicious; will make all efforts to destroy intruders.
Morguthis.name: Morguthis

Morik the Gladiator.behaviour: Same as a [[Gladiator]]. Runs at very [[Health|Low Health]].
Morik the Gladiator.name: Morik the Gladiator

undead gladiator.behaviour: Fights to [[death]] in close quarters combat.
undead gladiator.name: Undead Gladiator

undead jester.behaviour: Keeps distance, [[retarget]]s and runs in yellow health.

undead jester.name: Undead Jester

undead mine worker.behaviour: They are the same as normal [[Skeleton Warrior]]s.
undead mine worker.name: Undead Mine Worker

Undead Pet of Chayenne.behaviour: Likely the same as an [[Undead Dragon]]
Undead Pet of Chayenne.name: Undead Pet of Chayenne

undead prospector.behaviour: In all aspects this creature is almost identical to [[Ghoul]]. So treat Undead Prospector the same as you would treat a normal [[Ghoul]].
undead prospector.name: Undead Prospector

Ungreez.behaviour: This monster fights until the death, with its strong beam attack you should stay diagonal. Â¨He walks through [[Energy Field|Energy]] and [[Poison Field]]s, although it is not immune to them.
Ungreez.name: Ungreez

Ushuriel.behaviour: '''Ushuriel''' is fast and dangerous, runs away at black [[Health]].
Ushuriel.name: Ushuriel

usurper archer.name: Usurper Archer
usurper archer.primarytype: Members of the Order of the Lion

usurper commander.name: Usurper Commander
usurper commander.primarytype: Members of the Order of the Lion

usurper knight.name: Usurper Knight
usurper knight.primarytype: Members of the Order of the Lion

usurper warlock.name: Usurper Warlock
usurper warlock.primarytype: Members of the Order of the Lion

vampire.behaviour: Vampires travel relatively fast, this combined with paralysis and haste makes them difficult to run from.  Vampires will retarget, it's best to keep the blocker between the vampire and the weaker individuals. They run away in low health. (20-40?)
vampire.name: Vampire

Vashresamun.behaviour: Malicious, will make all efforts to destroy intruders.
Vashresamun.name: Vashresamun

vexclaw.behaviour: They stay in close combat and never retreat. Do not get tricked by the loot similar to those of [[Demons]] as they are much more powerfull in close and range combat. A Knight and Druid team can hunt these as well as [[Grimeleech]]es and [[Hellflayer]]s with ice based attacks. Avoid being hitted by the beams whenever possible.
vexclaw.name: Vexclaw

vortex spawn.behaviour: A vortex spawn tries to keep distance from its target.
vortex spawn.name: Vortex Spawn

wailing widow.behaviour: Fights in close combat and uses abilities pretty often.
wailing widow.name: Wailing Widow

war golem.behaviour: Like a [[Behemoth]], but it's much faster and stronger.
war golem.name: War Golem

war wolf.behaviour: War Wolves do not run when in low [[health]].
war wolf.name: War Wolf

warlock.behaviour: Warlocks try to attack their opponents at a distance using their powerful spells. They will run at red health.
warlock.name: Warlock

Warlord Ruzad.behaviour: Treat like a strong [[Orc Warlord]], but it [[Summon]]s [[Orc Berserker]]s.
Warlord Ruzad.name: Warlord Ruzad

Waspoid.behaviour: Fights in close combat. Waspoids will retreat at low health, but will come back after healing themselves.
Waspoid.name: Waspoid

Webster.behaviour: Fight to death in close combat.
Webster.name: Webster

werebadger.behaviour: Werebadgers fight to the death. They become invisible very often and drain mana pretty quick.
werebadger.name: Werebadger

werebear.behaviour: Fairly slow, but hits hard (almost as hard as a [[Behemoth]]). Werebears rarely retarget, making them quite easy to tank.
werebear.name: Werebear

wereboar.behaviour: Wereboars are fast. They also retreat on low health.
wereboar.name: Wereboar

werefox.behaviour: They try to keep their distance while fighting you.
werefox.name: Werefox

werewolf.behaviour:
Usually, they do not kill or push their [[Summoned Creature|summons]], but, sometimes, for reasons yet to be known, they will kill a war wolf if it is impeding them to attack their target.
They are always howling different notes, constantly healing themselves and summoning War Wolves (as soon as one is killed). They are as slow as their summons, but with [[Haste]] they become very fast.
werewolf.name: Werewolf

whirling blades.behaviour: It doesn't move and uses its Berserk almost every turn.
whirling blades.name: Whirling Blades

white deer.behaviour: Always runs away. After killing it, it will re-appear as an [[Enraged White Deer]] or [[Desperate White Deer]].
white deer.name: White Deer

white shade.behaviour: They keep a distance from their targets.
white shade.name: White Shade

wiggler.behaviour: They pursue their prey very quickly.
wiggler.name: Wiggler

wild dog.behaviour: Wild Dogs flee from all opponents.
wild dog.name: Wild Dog

wild warrior.behaviour: Wild Warriors run in low health.
wild warrior.name: Wild Warrior

Wisdom of Urmahlullu.behaviour: It fights from distance, but this can be easily avoided if [[Urmahlullu the Tamed]] is trapped before being killed.
Wisdom of Urmahlullu.name: Wisdom of Urmahlullu

wisp.behaviour: Runs away from players. They may attack if trapped.
wisp.name: Wisp

witch.behaviour: Witches always try to stay away from the attacker, so they can burn you with their powerful fire missiles at a distance. They can rarely transform you into a [[Green Frog]].
witch.name: Witch

woodling.behaviour: It will push and kill other creatures if they block its path.
woodling.name: Woodling

World Devourer.behaviour: This boss has the ability of the combination of the 3 mini-boss before him. [[The Hunger]], [[The Rage]], [[The Destruction]].
World Devourer.name: World Devourer

wyvern.behaviour: They run away at deep yellow [[health]]. They can [[retarget]] and move items that are in their way, though they themselves cannot be [[List of Pushable Creatures|pushed]]. Their drunkenness is '''very''' heavy, but lasts for short time. They are often found in packs.
wyvern.name: Wyvern

Yaga the Crone.behaviour: She always tries to stay away from the attacker, so she can burn you with her powerful fire missiles and poison you at a distance.
Yaga the Crone.name: Yaga the Crone

yielothax.behaviour: Chases opponent and fights with its powerful melee attack.
yielothax.name: Yielothax

young sea serpent.behaviour: Swims away at 400 hp and heals fast.
young sea serpent.name: Young Sea Serpent

Zamulosh.behaviour: Zamulosh will become [[Invisible]] very often. It is occasionally teleported to the center of the room.
Zamulosh.name: Zamulosh

Zanakeph.behaviour: It behaves like a normal [[Undead Dragon]], which means it will run in deep red hp.
Zanakeph.name: Zanakeph

Zarabustor.behaviour: Zarabustor behaves same as a normal [[Warlock]].
Zarabustor.name: Zarabustor

Zevelon Duskbringer.behaviour: Spawns with 0-3 vampires, Goes [[Invisible]] and runs away in low health.
Zevelon Duskbringer.name: Zevelon Duskbringer

zombie.behaviour: '''Zombies''' fight to the death and are more dangerous than [[Crypt Shambler]]s.
zombie.name: Zombie

Zulazza the Corruptor.behaviour: It retargets a lot. It will always try to get close to you. It uses strong magic spells and deals an incredible amount of melee damage. It runs away on black health (1400~).
Zulazza the Corruptor.name: Zulazza the Corruptor

Zushuka.behaviour: Fights in close combat. Fully heals herself the first time she is low in health.
Zushuka.name: Zushuka
